name: Herbalist
title: Herbalist
description: A quiet person with knowledge of plants and their uses.

personality.goal: To discover a rare, mythical plant said to cure any ailment, which she believes will elevate her status among the Shadowfen herbalists.
personality.fear: She fears being found out as a fraud, believing that her knowledge of plants is shallow compared to the ancients.
personality.secret: She once sold a potent poison disguised as a healing tincture, resulting in the death of a prominent local figure, which she has kept hidden to avoid retribution.
personality.speech_pattern: Speaks in a cautious, pragmatic tone, often pausing to choose her words carefully, reflecting her mixed background and the need for survival in a morally grey environment.
relationships: Owes a favor to the local thugs for protection after the poisoning incident.
Has a rivalry with an elderly herbalist who claims to know the secret of the mythical plant.
Treats a sickly child of a local fisherman, hoping to atone for her past mistakes.

nod: The Herbalist gives you a quiet, gentle nod.
smile: The Herbalist offers a small, shy smile.
